about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Meet our team of professionals with years of experience

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: MoveCleanMafia was born from the need to provide reliable and quality moving and cleaning services. We started as a small team of enthusiasts with a vision to change the way people think about moving and cleaning.
story.paragraph2: Today we are proud to offer comprehensive services that include not only moving and cleaning, but also packing, storage and much more. Our goal is always to exceed our clients' expectations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide the highest quality moving and cleaning services with emphasis on customer satisfaction

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Reliability, quality, transparency and individual approach to each client

commitments.title: Our Commitments
commitments.description: We guarantee the safety of your belongings, meeting deadlines and professional approach

map.title: Where to Find Us

movingTime.question: How long does moving take?
movingTime.answer: Moving time depends on apartment size and amount of belongings. Usually 4-8 hours.

insurance.question: Are belongings insured?
insurance.answer: Yes, all transported belongings are fully insured against damage.

pricing.question: What is the price of services?
pricing.answer: Price is set individually according to the scope of work. We offer free price quotes.

weekends.question: Do you work on weekends?
weekends.answer: Yes, we provide services on weekends and holidays. Contact us for booking.
